md:
giải nghĩa từ "carry" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Carry (verb) - mang, vác, cầm, đưa, chở
	+ Meaning: to hold or support something while moving it from one place to another
	+ Example: "She carried her baby on her back."
	+ Related words: bring, take, transport, bear
	+ Antonyms: drop, leave, abandon

* Carry (verb) - mang, vác, cầm, đưa, chở
	+ Meaning: to have something with you, especially in your hand or in a bag
	+ Example: "He carried a small bag with him."
	+ Related words: bring, take, hold, possess
	+ Antonyms: leave, abandon, drop

* Carry (verb) - mang, vác, cầm, đưa, chở
	+ Meaning: to continue or maintain something, such as a conversation or a project
	+ Example: "The team carried on with their work despite the difficulties."
	+ Related words: continue, maintain, sustain, persevere
	+ Antonyms: stop, quit, abandon, give up

* Carry (noun) - sự mang, sự vác, sự cầm, sự đưa, sự chở
	+ Meaning: the act of carrying something
	+ Example: "The carry of the luggage was very tiring."
	+ Related words: transportation, conveyance, haul, lift
	+ Antonyms: drop, leave, abandon

Note: The meanings and examples provided are not exhaustive, and there may be other ways to use the word "carry" depending on the context.

Note: The meanings and examples provided are not exhaustive, and there may be other ways to use the word "carry" depending on the context.
